changes_summary: These commits primarily focus on the TPT (likely a pet food/subscription service) and GOC projects, with major work on checkout flows, reactivation features, and UI components. Key themes include TypeScript migrations, test improvements, tracking event implementations, and pricing/order summary refactoring. Multiple teams are working on quiz functionality, checkout confirmation pages, and reactivation flows.

features.name: Reactivation Page Drawer
features.description: Created reactivation page drawer component with JS to TypeScript migration

features.name: Reactivation Success Modal
features.description: Built modal component for successful reactivation flow completion

features.name: Checkout Confirmation Tracking
features.description: Added tracking events for checkout confirmation page analytics

features.name: Order Summary Integration
features.description: Integrated order summary component on checkout-confirmation page

features.name: Custom Dropdown Disabled State
features.description: Added disabled state functionality to custom dropdown component

features.name: Quiz Step Data TestIDs
features.description: Added data-testid attributes to quiz steps for improved testing

features.name: Reusable Quiz Step Methods
features.description: Created new reusable methods for quiz step functionality

features.name: Selected Recipes Hook
features.description: Implemented custom hook for managing selected recipes state

features.name: Single SKU Benefit Pre-selection
features.description: Added logic to automatically pre-select single SKU benefits in reactivation flow

features.name: Calculate Prospect Batch Endpoint Feature Flag
features.description: Added feature flag for new calculate prospect batch endpoint in Factor Forn

decisions.what: Migrate price calculation endpoint in price summary component
decisions.rationale: Data source migration for pricing domain refinement

decisions.what: Hide voucher input form on order summary components
decisions.rationale: UI/UX decision for order summary display
Improve checkout user experience and flow

decisions.what: Refactor reactivation content for MR (likely Meal Replacement)
decisions.rationale: Content structure improvement for reactivation flow

decisions.what: Display 'FREE' copy when total price is 0
decisions.rationale: Improve clarity for zero-cost orders in summary

refactors.reason: JavaScript to TypeScript migration for type safety
Data source migration and domain refinement
refactors.impact: Price summary component and order summary displays

refactors.reason: Component update for GD (likely Good Dog brand)
Content structure refactoring for MR product line

key_patterns: JavaScript to TypeScript migration pattern for improved type safety
Test improvement focus with unquarantining tests and adding data-testids
Component reusability through custom hooks and shared methods
Feature flag usage for gradual rollout of new functionality
Separation of concerns with dedicated tracking event implementations
Domain-driven design with pricing domain refinement
Progressive enhancement of checkout and reactivation flows
Multi-brand support (GD, MR) with conditional content/components
Ticket-driven development with clear Jira references (TPT-*, GOC-*, RTEVMS-*)
